arrowOffset.description: Arrow offset in px, 5 by default
arrowOffset.description_zh: 箭头偏移量（以 px 为单位），默认为 5

arrowRadius.description: Arrow border-radius in px, 0 by default
arrowRadius.description_zh: 箭头 border-radius （以 px 为单位），默认为 0

arrowSize.description: Arrow size in px, 7 by default
arrowSize.description_zh: 箭头大小（以 px 为单位），默认为 7

closeDelay.description: Close delay in ms, applicable only to trigger="hover" variant
closeDelay.description_zh: 关闭延迟（以毫秒为单位），仅适用于 trigger=“hover” 变体

closeOnClickOutside.description: Determines whether dropdown should be closed on outside clicks
closeOnClickOutside.description_zh: 确定是否应在外部点击时关闭下拉列表

closeOnEscape.description: Determines whether dropdown should be closed when Escape key is pressed
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 确定在按下 Escape 键时是否应关闭下拉列表

closeOnItemClick.description: Determines whether Menu should be closed when item is clicked
closeOnItemClick.description_zh: 确定单击项时是否应关闭 Menu

defaultOpened.description_zh: 不受控制的菜单初始打开状态

disabled.description: If set, popover dropdown will not be rendered
disabled.description_zh: 如果设置，则不会呈现 popover 下拉列表

floatingStrategy.description: Changes floating ui position strategy, 'absolute' by default
floatingStrategy.description_zh: 更改浮动 ui 位置策略，默认为 'absolute'

id.description: Id base to create accessibility connections
id.description_zh: 用于创建辅助功能连接的 Id base

keepMounted.description: If set dropdown will not be unmounted from the DOM when it is hidden, display: none styles will be added instead
keepMounted.description_zh: 如果 set 下拉列表在隐藏时不会从 DOM 中卸载，则会添加 display： none 样式

loop.description: Determines whether arrow key presses should loop though items (first to last and last to first)
loop.description_zh: 确定箭头键按下是否应在项目之间循环（第一个到最后一个和最后一个到第一个）

menuItemTabIndex.description: Set the tabindex on all menu items. Defaults to -1
menuItemTabIndex.description_zh: 在所有菜单项上设置 tabindex。默认为 -1

middlewares.description: Floating ui middlewares to configure position handling, { flip: true, shift: true, inline: false } by default
middlewares.description_zh: 浮动 ui 中间件配置位置处理，默认 { flip： true， shift： true， inline： false }

offset.description: Offset of the dropdown element, 8 by default
offset.description_zh: 下拉元素的偏移量，默认为 8

onChange.description: Called when menu opened state changes
onChange.description_zh: 当菜单打开状态更改时调用

openDelay.description: Open delay in ms, applicable only to trigger="hover" variant
openDelay.description_zh: 开路延迟（以毫秒为单位），仅适用于 trigger=“hover” 变体

portalProps.description: Props to pass down to the Portal when withinPortal is true
portalProps.description_zh: 当 withinPortal 为 true 时传递给 Portal 的 props

position.description: Dropdown position relative to the target element, 'bottom' by default
position.description_zh: 相对于目标元素的下拉位置，默认为 'bottom'

positionDependencies.description: useEffect dependencies to force update dropdown position, [] by default
positionDependencies.description_zh: useEffect 依赖项强制更新下拉位置，默认为 []

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius

returnFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be automatically returned to control when dropdown closes, false by default
returnFocus.description_zh: 确定下拉列表关闭时是否应自动将焦点返回到控件，默认情况下为 false

shadow.description: Key of theme.shadows or any other valid CSS box-shadow value
shadow.description_zh: theme.shadows 的键或任何其他有效的 CSS box-shadow 值

transitionProps.description: Props passed down to the Transition component that used to animate dropdown presence, use to configure duration and animation type, { duration: 150, transition: 'fade' } by default
transitionProps.description_zh: 传递给 Transition 组件的 props，用于为下拉列表显示添加动画效果，用于配置持续时间和动画类型，默认为 { duration： 150， transition： 'fade' }

trapFocus.description: Determines whether dropdown should trap focus of keyboard events
trapFocus.description_zh: 确定下拉列表是否应捕获键盘事件的焦点

width.description: Dropdown width, or 'target' to make dropdown width the same as target element, 'max-content' by default
width.description_zh: 下拉宽度，或使下拉宽度与目标元素相同，默认为 'max-content'

withArrow.description: Determines whether component should have an arrow, false by default
withArrow.description_zh: 确定组件是否应具有箭头，默认情况下为 false

withinPortal.description: Determines whether dropdown should be rendered within the Portal, true by default
withinPortal.description_zh: 确定是否应在 Portal 中呈现下拉列表，默认为 true
